list.name: Default
list.comment: Updated TreeItemEventFactory to handle event names with the "on" prefix and to eliminate the onEvent attribute in favor of handling the closure directly.

option.name: myStatusName
option.value: Will be merged with property conflicts

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Updated TreeItemEventFactory to handle event names with the "on" prefix and to eliminate the onEvent attribute in favor of handling the closure directly.

MESSAGE.value: Updated the SwingGroovyFX demo to make it a simple browser application.
Changed the blend demo a little to make the effect more obvious. Fixed a close problem with the swing demo.
Updated blend demo again to include the mouse press handler from the interview code.
Minor changes: demo title and import cleanup.
Merged Jim's changes in with mine.
Start of chart support. Pie charts only.
Basic support for all XYCharts is included. Somethings aren't handled correctly like a horizontal bar chart with default axes, but all of the common cases should now be supported.
Removed reference to the FXML builder so it would compile on the publically released version of JavaFX.
Added code to the gradle build to dynamically find all the *Demo programs and create a task for running them.

Fixes for gradient builders being added to containers as children. Removed some dead code from the gradient factories. Created public static STOPS_PROPERTY to standardize the key used for storing stop nodes in the builder context.
ContainerFactory now only stores instances of NodeBuilder children for building and adding later.
Added BarChartExample for docs. XYChartFactory now processes all attributes manually since they are builder attributes. Added code to SceneFactory to process Builders as well as nodes.

Renamed demos to end in "Demo" and cleaned up some code for consistency. Some demo names have changed completely:
Main => GroovyFXDemo HelloAnimation => AnimationDemo HelloRectangleHover => TriggerDemo CircleT3DTest => Transform3DDemo HelloLightingEffect => LightingEffectDemo
...and several others.
Also eliminated the colors HashSet from SceneGraphBuilder in favor of using Color.NamedColors directly. Added GROOVYBLUE to the Colors class (and the namedColors map).
Added ability to specify data for a line chart directly using a Map<String, List> where the String is the series name and the List is the x,y data.
A text node can now take a string value to use as the text content. More demo cleanup.
Another batch of demo program renames and cleanup.
Made the rectangle translucent and added a click handler to restart the animation.

Last batch of demo cleanup and renaming. Fixed popup but in TreeViewDemo and made other minor changes. Added ability to restart the transitions in some of the transition demos. Allowed TabFactory to take a text value by default for tab names. Switched TableDemo to using the new @FXBindable notation.
Changed name and title of demo to be consistent with TreeViewDemo.

Updated the FXBindable transform: the property name is changed to prevent conflicts with the original property and with other AST transforms. Lots of documentation and refactoring. Removed the intermediate $property object in the getter/setter method bodies to greatly simplify the resulting byte code.
Cleaned up a few warnings.

Changed the generated code. The FX property is now named "somethingProp" while its accessor is now "getSomethingProperty". This allows writing things like bind(myClass.somethingProperty) instead of bind(myClass.somethingProperty()).

Implemented the new event syntax and refactored the existing event handlers into a class hierarchy. Added the GroovyEventHandler base class from which GroovyKeyHandler and GroovyMouseHandler now derive. Add GroovyActionHandler which also derives from GroovyEventHandler and is created by the onAction node to handle action events on buttons, text fields, etc. Updated the demos to the new event syntax. Changed SVGPath to svgPath for consistency. Renamed branchCollapsed to onBranchCollapsed to be consistent with the other event handlers. Started on IDEA support with groovyfx.gdsl. Removed the depricated textBox and passwordBox from ControlFactory.

Implemented the new event syntax and refactored the existing event handlers into a class hierarchy. Added the GroovyEventHandler base class from which GroovyKeyHandler and GroovyMouseHandler now derive. Add GroovyActionHandler which also derives from GroovyEventHandler and is created by the onAction node to handle action events on buttons, text fields, etc. Updated the demos to the new event syntax. Changed SVGPath to svgPath for consistency. Renamed branchCollapsed to onBranchCollapsed to be consistent with the other event handlers. Started on IDEA support with groovyfx.gdsl. Removed the deprecated textBox and passwordBox from ControlFactory and from SGB.
Updated TreeItemEventFactory to handle event names with the "on" prefix and to eliminate the onEvent attribute in favor of handling the closure directly.
